name: part_013
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】SPACE for Virtual GHOST【#星街すいせい3周年LIVE】 [Ajwv4ANSSg0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_013.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei performs "Tenkyu, Suisei wa Yoru wo Mataide" at her 3rd Anniversary Live.
scenes.song_name: Tenkyu, Suisei wa Yoru wo Mataide

scenes.description: MC section where Suisei thanks the audience for the 3rd anniversary and encourages them to sing along.
Instrumental intro for the next song, with "GHOST" title appearing on screen.

subtitles.original: 天球、彗星は夜を跨いで
subtitles.english: Tenkyu, Suisei wa Yoru wo Mataide
...da

subtitles.original: 僕の吐いた白い息のように 消してしまえたらな
subtitles.english: If only I could erase it like the white breath I exhaled.

subtitles.original: 押し殺して深く沈んだ 泣き声さえ響いているから
subtitles.english: Because even the suppressed, deeply sunken sobs are echoing.

subtitles.original: 君を刺した不安も苦痛も 僕の青色で塗りつぶして
subtitles.english: Let me paint over the anxiety and pain that pierced you with my blue.

subtitles.original: 全部、涙になって 星の海を辿っていった
subtitles.english: Everything turned into tears and traced the sea of stars.

subtitles.original: 果てしない闇の中に そっと手を添えたらほら
subtitles.english: If I gently place my hand in the endless darkness, look...

subtitles.original: 彗星が僕の頭上を飛んだ
subtitles.english: A comet flew over my head.

subtitles.original: 誰もいない夜の空を埋めた
subtitles.english: Filling the empty night sky.

subtitles.original: 深くに沈まった街の中へ 降り注ぐのは誰の悲しみだろう
subtitles.english: Whose sadness is raining down into the deeply sunken city?

subtitles.original: 星はまた雲抜けて飛んだ
subtitles.english: The star flew through the clouds again.

subtitles.original: 靄のかかった思考を晴らして
subtitles.english: Clearing away the misty thoughts.

subtitles.original: いつかまた会えるなんて言えなかった
subtitles.english: I couldn't say that we'd meet again someday.

subtitles.original: 星が降ったあとの街 僕はもうずっと君の行方を探してた
subtitles.english: In the city after the stars fell, I've been searching for your whereabouts all this time.

subtitles.original: もし今、頷いて目を見ている 描かれたその時を待ってるの
subtitles.english: If now, I'm nodding and looking into your eyes, am I waiting for that moment to be drawn?

subtitles.original: きらめく空 決めてる日々に 伝える、このメロディ
subtitles.english: To the days decided by the sparkling sky, I'll convey this melody.

subtitles.original: わー！3周年、本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Wow! Thank you so much for the 3rd anniversary!

subtitles.original: みんなも一緒に歌ってください！
subtitles.english: Everyone, please sing along too!

subtitles.original: 4年目もいくぞー！
subtitles.english: Let's go for the 4th year too!

subtitles.original: 窓から覗いた 雨の降る街並みを
subtitles.english: I peered through the window at the rainy city streets.

subtitles.original: 弾ける音だから ポケットに詰め込んで
subtitles.english: Because it's a popping sound, I'll stuff it in my pocket.

subtitles.original: Let's dance now 君の好きな キャラメルのステップに乗せて
subtitles.english: Let's dance now, to the beat of your favorite caramel steps.

subtitles.original: 魔法のような ライムライトが私を照らしてる
subtitles.english: Like magic, the limelight is shining on me.

subtitles.original: 星を繋いで 夢を描くよ
subtitles.english: Connecting the stars, I'll draw my dreams.

subtitles.original: 描かれたその声が呼んでるの
subtitles.english: That voice that was drawn is calling out.

subtitles.original: きらめく空 待ってた君に 届ける このメロディ
subtitles.english: To the sparkling sky and you who were waiting, I'll deliver this melody.

subtitles.original: このままじゃね 終われない
subtitles.english: I can't let it end like this.

subtitles.original: Special & Stage 踊り明かすの
subtitles.english: Special & Stage, we'll dance all night.

subtitles.original: このままじっとしてられない
subtitles.english: I can't just stand still like this.

subtitles.original: 走り出そうよ 世界は変わるから
subtitles.english: Let's start running, because the world will change.

subtitles.original: 歌って！
subtitles.english: Sing!

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: 明日は晴れるから
subtitles.english: Because tomorrow will be clear.

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: La la la...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: 明日は晴れるから
subtitles.english: Because tomorrow will be clear.

subtitles.original: 浅く弾けた感情に
subtitles.english: In the shallowly popped emotions.

subtitles.original: 言い訳を並べて過ごした
subtitles.english: I spent my time lining up excuses.

subtitles.original: 勝ちも知らない街灯に
subtitles.english: To the streetlights that don't even know victory.

subtitles.original: 君だけだって嘘を見た
subtitles.english: I saw the lie that it was only you.

subtitles.original: 信じたくもないままで 踊っている
subtitles.english: Dancing without even wanting to believe.

subtitles.original: 指の隙間に連ね続けた
subtitles.english: I continued to string them together through the gaps in my fingers.

subtitles.original: 言葉 見えないの 僕が
subtitles.english: Words... I can't see them.

subtitles.original: 僕の この声が聞こえてる
subtitles.english: My... can you hear this voice of mine?

subtitles.original: Dancer in the dark シルエット すらも 肯定できた
subtitles.english: Dancer in the dark, I could even affirm the silhouette.
